General.Name: Zacapa Resources Ltd
General.Description: Zacapa Resources Ltd., a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of copper and gold resources in the United States. The company holds 100% interests in the South Bullfrog project comprising 488 unpatented mining claims covering an area of 40 square kilometers located in the Walker Lane trend, Nevada. It also holds interests in the Dewdrop Moon project that consists of 159 unpatented mining claims covering an area of 12.7 square kilometers located in the Walker Lane trend, Nevada; the Pearl project, which consists of 241 lode mining claims covering an area approximately 20 square kilometers located near San Manuel, Arizona; and the Miller Mountain project comprising 238 unpatented mining claims covering an area of 19.9 square kilometers located in west-central Idaho. The company was formerly known as Zambia Gold Corp. and changed its name to Zacapa Resources Ltd. in January 2018. Zacapa Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 West Hastings, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2J3
